General.Name: Waraba Gold Limited
General.Description: Waraba Gold Limited acquires and evaluates gold properties in Mali, West Africa. Its flagship prospective gold exploration project is the Fokolore project located in West Mali. The company was formerly known as Zenith Exploration Inc. and changed its name to Waraba Gold Limited in October 2020. Waraba Gold Limited was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
